data.message: how can I get rid of " people I might know? and sometimes post appear twice!

replies.message: Hi Steve. We're sorry to hear that you're seeing things you don't like. To stop seeing stories from a particular person or Page, click the arrow in the top right of the story and select Unfollow. This will prevent you seeing stories from this person or Page in future. For more information, visit our Help Center at: http://on.fb.me/1E5tjFr. -Chantal
@Facebook, I believe Steve Mora's question was related to something else, wasn't it?
